element-citation.article-title: Transforming clinical data into actionable prognosis models: machine-learning framework and field-deployable app to predict outcome of Ebola patients

ref.mixed-citation: Colubri A, Silver T, Fradet T, Retzepi K, Fry B, Sabeti P. Transforming Clinical Data into Actionable Prognosis Models: Machine-Learning Framework and Field-Deployable App to Predict Outcome of Ebola Patients. PLoS neglected tropical diseases. 2016;10(3):e0004549.
